chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 12 mini has a problem:
I prefer to buy a new product.
Thank you,

When the seller receives the package, they have 3 business days (5 business days for portable and household appliances) to repair or replace the product, or 2 business days to make a refund if it proceeds.
The customer meets the following requirements for the return to be made:
✔ Confirms that the device has not been opened by a third party, exposed to water, or suffered an impact or fall
✔ Confirms that they have deleted their personal data
✔ Have confirmed that they have the return label.
✔ Understands that accessories and purchase proof must be included in the return package.
✔ Understands that they have 14 days to use the return label.
Remember: once delivered, the seller has 3 business days (5 business days for portable and household appliances) to repair or replace the article and 2 business days to make a refund if necessary.

Dear Backcare,

We have refunded the customer.

Regards,
AS
